game.name: BunkerZ
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Stylized WWI trenches meet explosive co-op mayhem. Hold the bunker as a Rifleman, Medic, Engineer, or Machine Gunner. Fight back with era specific WWI weapons, shovels, and flamethrowers, then launch undead sky-high with grenades and explosives. Solo or multiplayer survival at its most chaotic.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Stylized WWI trenches meet explosive co-op mayhem. Hold the bunker as a Rifleman, Medic, Engineer, or Machine Gunner. Fight back with era specific WWI weapons, shovels, and flamethrowers, then launch undead sky-high with grenades and explosives. Solo or multiplayer survival at its most chaotic.
